name: Bella
long_description: Bella is a friendly and playful dog who loves to spend time with people. She is very energetic and enjoys playing fetch. She gets along well with other pets and children.

name: Max
long_description: Max is a curious and affectionate hamster who loves to explore his surroundings. He enjoys being petted and will often curl up in your hand. He is also quite playful and enjoys running on his wheel.

name: Luna
long_description: Luna is a gentle and quiet rabbit who enjoys a calm and peaceful environment. She loves being petted and will often sit quietly by your side. She is very affectionate and enjoys nibbling on fresh vegetables.

name: Charlie
long_description: Charlie is a colorful and active fish who loves swimming around his tank. He enjoys exploring his underwater environment and is very peaceful. Watching him swim can be very relaxing and calming.

name: Lucy
long_description: Lucy is a playful and curious kitten who loves to explore her surroundings. She enjoys chasing toys and climbing on furniture. She is very affectionate and enjoys being around people.

name: Milo
long_description: Milo is a chirpy and cheerful bird who loves to sing and chirp. He enjoys flying around and exploring his cage. He is very social and enjoys interacting with people and other birds.

name: Daisy
long_description: Daisy is a loyal and protective dog who is always alert and ready to guard her family. She is very intelligent and easy to train. She loves going for walks and spending time outdoors.

name: Oscar
long_description: Oscar is an independent and curious kitten who enjoys exploring his surroundings. He is very intelligent and enjoys solving puzzles and playing with toys. He is affectionate but also enjoys his alone time.

name: Ruby
long_description: Ruby is an energetic and playful hamster who loves to run on her wheel and explore her cage. She enjoys being handled and is very curious about her surroundings. She is very friendly and enjoys interacting with people.
